gregor-ballantine.name: Gregor "The Crow" Ballantine
gregor-ballantine.title: The Founder / The Crow
gregor-ballantine.description: The progenitor of the Ballantine ruthlessness and the founder of the modern logistics empire. Established the family philosophy: 'Source resources from the tragedies of others.'

isobel-ballantine.name: Isobel Ballantine (née Unknown)
isobel-ballantine.title: The Crow's Shadow
isobel-ballantine.description: Gregor Ballantine's wife. A silent witness to the family's dark rise.

donan-ballantine.name: Donan Ballantine
donan-ballantine.title: The Old Guard / The Cousin
donan-ballantine.description: Gregor's cousin, part of the old guard who functioned as an uncle figure to Ewan and Ruaraidh. Skeptical of Ruaraidh's methods, eliminated in 'The Last Supper'.

ewan-ballantine.name: Ewan "The Honorable" Ballantine
ewan-ballantine.title: The Honorable / The Tragic Baron
ewan-ballantine.description: Gregor's son. Ashamed of his father's legacy ('Honor Sickness'), tried to legitimize the family, leading to his death by the O'Malley gang.

moira-ballantine.name: Moira Ballantine (married name placeholder)
moira-ballantine.title: The Distant Aunt
moira-ballantine.description: Ewan's sister, Ruaraidh's paternal aunt. Likely married into another influential family, maintaining distance from the core conflicts.

aileen-drummond.name: Aileen Ballantine (née Drummond)
aileen-drummond.title: The Grieving Mother
aileen-drummond.description: Ewan Ballantine's wife, Ruaraidh's mother from the Drummond family. Devastated by her husband's death, she rejects her son.

eamon-drummond.name: Eamon Drummond
eamon-drummond.title: The Maternal Uncle / The Instigator
eamon-drummond.description: Aileen's brother, Ruaraidh's maternal uncle. Called for vengeance after Ewan's death. Survived 'The Last Supper' due to illness, becoming the sole witness.

fiona-drummond.name: Fiona Drummond (married name placeholder)
fiona-drummond.title: The Concerned Aunt
fiona-drummond.description: Aileen and Eamon's sister, Ruaraidh's maternal aunt. Represents the Drummond family's perspective outside the immediate conflict.

ruaraidh-ballantine.name: Ruaraidh "The Wolf" Ballantine
ruaraidh-ballantine.title: The Wolf / Baron of Leith / The CEO of the Abyss
ruaraidh-ballantine.description: Ewan's son. Adopts 'Honor is Weakness' philosophy, ruthlessly rebuilding the empire on efficiency and control after his father's murder.

elizabeth-sinclair.name: Elizabeth Sinclair
elizabeth-sinclair.title: The Catalyst / The Mother
elizabeth-sinclair.description: Mother of Ruaraidh's child. Fled to Los Angeles after Ruaraidh rejected the baby, forced to give him up for adoption.

havi-sinclair.name: Havi Sinclair (Ballantine)
havi-sinclair.title: The Owl / The Ghost in the System
havi-sinclair.description: Son of Ruaraidh and Elizabeth, raised unaware of his lineage. A digital prodigy who masters system manipulation in the orphanage.
